events.message: The applicant submitted the personal loan application to cover medical expenses and consolidate some credit card debt.
Application was categorized under personal loans due to keywords related to medical and debt consolidation purposes.
A dedicated loan officer has been assigned to oversee the applicant's personal loan and help guide the process.
Loan officer completed the initial review focusing on the applicant’s financial statements and loan purpose.
Requested detailed medical bills, proof of income, and credit statements to assess the applicant’s eligibility.
Applicant submitted all requested medical bills, pay stubs, and recent credit reports as part of the verification process.
Credit bureau reports obtained and reviewed to evaluate the applicant’s creditworthiness and past loan repayment behavior.
Risk assessment determined a moderate risk due to existing debts but stable income and good medical justification.
A loan offer was presented with an interest rate tailored to the applicant’s credit profile and requested amount.
Applicant provided positive feedback on the loan offer and expressed intention to accept after reviewing terms.
Loan officer approved the personal loan application after successful review, credit check, and applicant feedback.
Funds disbursed to the applicant’s bank account for medical expenses and debt consolidation as per the loan agreement.
A post-approval follow-up was conducted to ensure the applicant is satisfied and answer any questions regarding repayment.
The loan application was formally closed after successful funding and provision of all post-approval information.
